title: Design a Dashboard for SokoFund
challengeDescription: A Fintech company that is developing a Digital Financial Platform designed for businesses and their workforce in Africa is partnering with Umurava to run a Skills Challenge for Product Design.
deliverables: Requirements Catalog and User Interaction Diagram
User Interface Mockups
Payroll and HR System Design Completed
productRequirements: UX research to understand Project Requirements
productDesign: User Interface Design for each step
Creating wireframes to outline the basic structure and layout of the web and mobile app.
Designing visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces for the web and mobile apps focusing on usability and user experience.
Ensuring the web application works seamlessly across web, mobile, and tablet devices.
Provide a feedback session for in-development guidance
notes: Find Product Requirements Summary and Features Description for Saway Pay HERE
